content.description: The route ascents the left side of the west face of The Stadium. It starts in the right of two ramps. Go up past 7 bolts to a bolted anchor on a ledge system near the top of the west face of The Stadium.
content.protection: Seven bolts to a bolted anchor.  (no rings.  Rap from the bolted anchor on The Arena.
content.location: Left side of the west face of The Stadium

content.description: This route is located on the far left side of the Stadium.  It is on the narrow north face.
content.protection: Ascend steep featured rock past 4 or 5 bolts to open cold shuts and one bolt.
content.location: Far left side of The Stadium on it's narrow north face.

content.description: This is the right of three routes on the west face of The Stadium.
content.protection: Four or five bolts to a bolted anchor.  Rap from the anchor on The Arena.
content.location: Right most route on the west face of The Stadium.

content.description: This route is actually not on The Stadium, but on a smaller formation in a corridor just left of The Stadium.
content.protection: Three bolts to a bolted anchor.  Walk off.
content.location: Start in a very narrow corridor and stem up until you can clip a bolt.  Ascend past two more bolts to the summit and a bolted anchor.  Walk off.

content.description: This route is also not on The Stadium but on the smaller formation just left of The Stadium.  The route goes directly up the main face.
content.protection: Five bolts to a bolted anchor.  Walk off the backside.
content.location: Located on the small formation just left of The Stadium, in a narrow corridor.

content.description: There are two routes on the N. face of The Stadium. This is the right one, and it is on the arete which makes up the edge of the north and west faces.
content.protection: Climb up the left of two ramps until you come to a small roof.  Cut left and then up the arete past a couple more bolts to a bolted anchor on the arete.  Lower from these anchors.
content.location: on the arete at the intersection of the north and west faces of The Stadium.  It is the right of two bolted sport climbs on the n. face of the Stadium.

content.description: The middle route on the west face of The Stadium. Clip a bolt from standing on a boulder.  Move right then up to a bolt.  Careful with the 2nd clip.  Climb up past 3 more bolts to a bolted anchor with rings on a ledge system near the top of the west face of The Stadium.
content.protection: Climb up past five bolts to a bolted anchor with rings.  This is the rap station for the three routes on the west face of The Stadium.
content.location: middle of w. face of The Stadium
